cause.description:
In our advanced world today, we have so many options and resources at our hands...yet we are still plagued by something as archaic and degrading as sexual violence, whether it be rape, incest, or exploitation. This issue has been silent for far too long and it's time that we begin a positive change by first educating and then enforcing empowerment for men and women.
1. Sexual violence is degrading both to its victims and its perpetrators and must end.
2. Sexual violence is a curable disease.
cause.mission: end the tyranny of sexual violence.
cause.name: End of sexual violence
